text:
October 16, 1952
Mr. Allen Miller, Director
Region VI, NAEB
KWSC, State College of Washington
Pullman, Washington
Dear Allens
I appreciate receiving your letter regarding
‘Tom* I am one who has said I would have to be convinced
that I should vote "yes.* 'That indicates I have doubts
regarding Tom. Frankly, I still am after reading
Morris® letter. I*m not obstinate (1 hope I'm not in
this case); I Just want to be sure. I believe I could
be convinced a lot faster in Tom's favor than I could
on lots of others. I write to assure you I am In
sympathy with your general attitude regarding such
cases. I believe my records of the years would orove
me as one who practices such theory.
Regards,
FESsfrah
Frank B. Schooley
Treasurer
